data.title: Windows 98
data.meta_description: Windows 98 - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
2. INTRODUCTION • Windows98 developed by Microsoft. • The version is 4.1 & code name is Memphis. • Windows98 integrated the internet standard. • It works faster & has a greater stability. • It unifies & simplifies desktop.

3. FEATURES in Windows98 • Windows98 edited on the basis of Windows95 • It improves the hardware standard. • When there is a error in program you can just stop the program and the system will not be affected. • It is completely different from Windows95. • It supports DVD player. • Windows98 is also called Active Desktop.

4. ADVANTAGES in Windows98 • Convenient to INSTALL • PLUG & PLAY Function • Supports long FILE NAME • PLAY CD automatically • Easier to USE • Windows98 is FASTER • Windows98 is ENTERTAINING

5. ADVANTAGES • Convenient to INSTALL: Windows98 will lead you to the complete installation and examine hardware’s. • PLUG & PLAY function: Windows98 will set it automatically. • Supports long FILE NAME: It makes finding the file easier.

6. ADVANTAGES • PLAY CD automatically: Windows98 will play the CD automatically instead of tedious operation. • Easier to USE: Windows98 is a single user multitasking, multiuser operating system. • Windows98 is FASTER: Windows & programs open faster then ever before • Windows98 is ENTERTAINING: Windows98 supports digital DVD & Audio player.
